nodes.text: A H'nemthe with both blue-gray- and pink-colored skin sat at the bar of a cantina on the Mid Rim moon Cavamina Minor in 22 BBY. The Jedi Knight Aayla Secura arrived at the cantina with an escort of clone troopers in search of the pirate Attuma Duum, but they were attacked by several operatives in Duum's employ. Secura was the only survivor of the ensuing lightfight, which left everyone else in the cantina, including the H'nemthe, dead.
The H'nemthe patron appeared in a single panel of the 2010 graphic novella The Clone Wars: Deadly Hands of Shon-Ju. The character was drawn by Brian Koschak.
